text: Ukuhlehlisa (inyanga engcwele) ngempela kungukunezezela ekungakholweni okudukiswa ngakho labo abangakholwayo bakwenza kube semthethweni (ukuyihlehlisa inyanga engcwele ngomunye) unyaka ukuze kuvumelane (nesibalo sezinyanga) azenza zaba ngcwele uMvelinqangi ngakho-ke bakwenza kwaba semthethweni lokho akwenqabela uMvelinqangi, yenziwa yabukeka kubona imihle imisebenzi yabo emibi futhi uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abangakholwayo
